NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
2151 Highland Avenue
Suite 206
Birmingham 5, Alabama
January 5, 1962
Mr. Harold Hill
NAEB Headquarters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Harold:
The attached card is that of a sales engineer representing Lenkurt
Electric Company, Inc. Mr. Sheppard is of the opinion that his firm
might well become an Industrial Member of NAEB and has encouraged
us to approach them on the matter. I am leaving this with you, knowÂ¬
ing that it will receive the proper attention.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours
RDH/ml
Raymond D. Hurlbert
Director, Region II
enc.
